#summary Victor 86B USB DMM interface.

= Introduction =

Decodes and displays output from *Victor 86B USB DMM* based on *HIDAPI* http://www.signal11.us/oss/hidapi/

= Details =

Decodes and displays output from *Victor 86B USB DMM* based on *HIDAPI* http://www.signal11.us/oss/hidapi/

USB HID packet (buf)

{{{
LCD       digits           annunciators
        -   -   -   - 
       | | | | | | | | 
     -  -   -   -   -       M            Hz  
       | | | | | | | |   DC REL          V
        -   -   -   -    AC HOLD m oC u  A
          .   .   .
 buf  3,10 6,9 5,7 0,2   1  4    8 11 12 13

}}}
